name: Sad & Furious
description:
This game was made for the GMTK 2022 game jam - Roll the Dice

Sixy is a especial die, instead of numbers, like a normal die, he has words on his faces. He is in a journey to prove his worth!

We hope you like it!

Please share any feedback!

To see the credits of the assets we use: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1sI9mdnS8dmyNB0LNpJqg31_0Q6dT30wDcv-rzeF1zk8/edit#
